online.common
Interface DrawableSprite

All Known Implementing Classes:
ccell, cell, CheckerCell, CheckerChip, chip, chipCell, hexCell, hexChip, stackCell, StockArt
public interface DrawableSprite

a drawable sprite can be anything that implements drawchip, for the purpose of displaying an animation element. As currently implemented, this can be a piece of stockart, a simple chip, a cell, or a stackcell. In the case of a stackcell, the element spacing must also be stored somewhere.

Author:
ddyer
